lang.title: Language Settings
lang.description: Choose your preferred language for the application.
lang.save.toast.title: Settings Saved
lang.save.toast.description: Your language preference has been successfully saved.
account.logoutConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to log out?
account.logoutConfirmDesc: You will be returned to the login page and will need to log in again to access your account.
security.title: Account Security
security.error.passwordMismatch: New password confirmation does not match.
security.error.passwordLength: New password must be at least 6 characters long.
security.error.sessionInvalid: Your session is invalid. Please log in again.
security.error.unexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
security.error.wrongPassword: The current password you entered is incorrect.
security.error.weakPassword: The new password is too weak. Use at least 6 characters.
security.success.passwordUpdated: Your password has been successfully updated.
login.title: Welcome Back
login.success.title: Login Successful
login.error.title: Login Failed
login.error.description: An error occurred. Please try again.
